trans-unit.source: Assign Rights to LDAP Users and Groups

seg-source.mrk: Assign Rights to LDAP Users and Groups

target.mrk: Attribuer des droits aux utilisateurs et aux groupes LDAP

trans-unit.source: If you are using an LDAP users directory, you must assign rights to your LDAP users to enable them to connect to the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

seg-source.mrk: If you are using an LDAP users directory, you must assign rights to your LDAP users to enable them to connect to the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

target.mrk: Si vous utilisez un répertoire d'utilisateurs LDAP, vous devez attribuer des droits à vos utilisateurs LDAP pour leur permettre de se connecter à la <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.
